testcase.name: Successfully change language to Urdu
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Daraz homepage............................................passed When I click on the language change button..................................passed And I select Urdu as the language...........................................passed Then I return to the homepage...............................................passed

testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials on Daraz
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Daraz login page.......................................passed When user enters valid credentials..........................................passed And user clicks on the Daraz login button...................................passed Then user is navigated to the Daraz home page...............................passed

testcase.name: Unsuccessful login with invalid credentials on Daraz
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Daraz login page.......................................passed When user enters invalid credentials........................................passed And user clicks on the Daraz login button...................................passed Then an error message is displayed..........................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Daraz login page.......................................passed When user enters empty credentials..........................................passed And user clicks on the Daraz login button...................................passed Then an error message is displayed..........................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Daraz login page.......................................passed When user enters credentials................................................passed And user clicks on the Daraz login button...................................passed Then an error message is displayed..........................................passed
